name: @cncflora/iucn-redlist-api-wrapper
description: The iucn-redlist-api-wrapper is a TypeScript package that provides a convenient interface for interacting with the IUCN Redlist API. This package allows you to fetch data about taxa, including details by SIS ID, scientific name, and more.
author: Vicente Calfo <vicentecalfo.dev@gmail.com>
